item.title: BENTO+
item.description: BENTO+: Tableware designed for office workers BENTO+ is a set of specilly designed bento boxes that have a redesigned user experience. It incorporates special hinges that allows the bento boxes to swivel, making it easy to load up with your favorite recipes and lit up to go without having to close each of the bento boxes. The idea comes from my own experience of bringing breakfast in lunch boxes every day.
